did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: University Archives, McConnell Library, Radford University
did.physloc: Located in locked compact shelving, shelf 15A, level 1.
did.abstract: Contains materials related to the City of Radford that were collected in McConnell Library clipping files during the 1970s and 1980s.Includes newspaper clippings, booklets, pamphlets, student papers, correspondence, photographs, programs, documents, magazine articles, maps, and other materials. For more information see the collection finding aid.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: An appointment for research is required. The collection is open for research. No interlibrary loan.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials in this collection were gathered from news sources, local organizations, Radford City publications, student research papers, and other materials collected in file cabinets in McConnell Library during the 1970s and 80s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Materials in this collection were gathered from news sources, local organizations, Radford City publications, student research papers, and other materials collected in file cabinets in McConnell Library during the 1970s and 80s. Topically, this collection covers education, schools, local history, businesses, public health, government, local clubs and organizations, churches, the public library, recreation, and other topics related to the City of Radford.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p:
Arrangement is as follows:
Box 1. Schools and Education
Box 2. History, Health and Business
Box 3. Clubs, Government, Sociology, and General
Box 4. Churches and News
Box 5. Library, Radio, Public, Maps, and History
Box 6. History and Recreation
